CACM-1162 Score: 4.600385714672171

Packed Scatter Tables Scatter tables open addressing benefit from recursive entry displacements, cutoffs unsuccessful searches, auxiliary cost functions. Compared with conventional methods, new techniques provide substantially improved tables that resemble exact-solution optimal packings. The displacements are depth-limited approximations to enumerative (exhaustive) optimization, although packing costs remain linear-O(n)-with table size n.

Packed Scatter Tables Scatter tables open addressing benefit from recursive entry displacements, cutoffs unsuccessful searches, auxiliary cost functions. Some New Upper Bounds on Generation Prime Numbers Given integer N, what is computational complexity finding all primes less than N? A modified sieve Eratosthenes using doubly linked lists yields algorithm O(N) arithmetic complexity. This upper bound is shown to be equivalent to theoretical lower bound sieve methods without preprocessing.
